title: Image Upload and Drag-Drop on Hat Canvas
description: Verify users can upload images and drag, resize, and position them smoothly on the hat canvas within safe printing zones.

steps.description: Navigate to Design Studio
Upload an image file
Check that the uploaded image is displayed on the hat canvas
Drag the image within the safe printing zone on the canvas
Verify the image moves smoothly and stays within the boundaries of the safe zone
Resize the image using control handles
Confirm resizing functions smoothly and image remains visible within safe printing zones

title: Text Addition and Layer Management
description: Ensure users can add text layers, modify text properties, reorder layers, and remove layers accurately on the hat canvas.

steps.description: Open Design Studio and add a text layer
Verify text appears on the hat canvas
Edit text content, font size, and color
Confirm changes are reflected immediately on canvas
Reorder multiple layers using layer management controls
Check layering order updates consistently across canvas and layer panel
Remove a text layer
Verify layer is removed and canvas updates accordingly

title: Product Configuration and Price Update
description: Validate hat color, size, and quantity selections update the price dynamically including application of bulk discounts.

steps.description: Navigate to Design Studio
Select different hat colors and sizes from product sidebar
Confirm hat image and available options reflect chosen color and size
Adjust quantity incrementally, including bulk quantities
Verify price updates dynamically with correct bulk discount applied

title: Safe Printing Zone Enforcement
description: Verify that safe printing zones overlay updates per admin configuration and that design elements clip correctly without losing visibility.

steps.description: Login to Admin Dashboard
Modify safe printing zone dimensions
Check that the updated safe zone overlays reflect immediately in Design Studio
Place design elements partially outside the new safe zone boundaries
Confirm elements are clipped correctly without complete loss of visibility

title: Language Toggle and Internationalization Support
description: Ensure that switching languages updates all UI text dynamically without missing translation keys or console errors.

steps.description: Navigate to any page
Toggle application language via language selector
Verify all visible text updates to the selected language
Check browser console for absence of translation or runtime errors

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Touch Interaction
description: Test the application UI on mobile devices ensuring canvas scales correctly, sidebar stacks properly, and touch-based draggable elements function smoothly.

steps.description: Access Design Studio on a mobile device or emulator
Ensure the canvas is scaled properly without overflow
Verify the sidebar stacks beneath or above the canvas with accessible controls
Use touch gestures to drag and resize design elements
Confirm touch interactions are smooth, precise, and consistent

title: Admin Dashboard Authentication and Access Control
description: Confirm that only authenticated users can access Admin Dashboard and unauthenticated users are redirected appropriately.

steps.description: Attempt to access Admin Dashboard URL without logging in
Verify redirection to login page
Log in with valid admin credentials
Confirm successful login and access to Admin Dashboard
Log out and attempt to access Admin Dashboard again
Validate user is redirected to login page after logout

title: User Dashboard Order Status Tracking
description: Verify that logged-in users can view their order status on the User Dashboard correctly and order data updates as expected.

steps.description: Log in as a standard user
Navigate to User Dashboard
Confirm that the userâ€™s order list and their current statuses are displayed
Simulate or update order status
Verify that the order status updates reflect on the dashboard in real-time or upon refresh

title: Gallery Display and Navigation
description: Ensure the Gallery page loads design examples and user reviews correctly with navigation functioning.

steps.description: Navigate to Gallery page
Validate that design examples and user reviews are visible
Use navigation controls to browse gallery items
Confirm navigation works correctly and content loads without delays or errors

title: Error Handling on Invalid Image Upload
description: Verify the system handles invalid image formats or corrupted files gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a non-image or corrupted file in Design Studio
Check that the upload is rejected and a user-friendly error message is displayed
Confirm no crashes or unhandled exceptions occur
